title: BOTS BOTS AND MORE BOTS

embed.description: By definition, a bot (short for "web robot") is a software program that operates as an agent for an individual, group of individuals, organization or even legitimate businesses. Many organizations default to simply blocking bots, categorizing them all as malicious security threats.

body: Holy fking sht! Aram has become infested with bots! Not a single game goes by I'm not playing with 2 or more bots in a game from both sides! Riot take the dik out from your arse and BAN BAN BAN

replies.body:
Hey there,

While I don't personally encounter bots _too_ frequently in my ARAM games, I agree with you that they are a problem and understand how frustrating it can be to be matched with one or more bot accounts.

The best thing for you to do is to report these players in the post-game lobby for "Cheating" and be as descriptive as possible in the report message about them botting.

Accounts are banned in waves, similar to how Valves anti-cheat system bans accounts. This is to ensure that the people developing/using their tools are not aware of when or what was detected.
Noticed that the bots in ARAM regularly take cleanse + snowball and they don't have a mastery. Sometimes they _will_ have a mastery but **always ** have cleanse + snowball
